vigilant.translation[0].definitions[0].d: giving careful attention to what is happening, so that you will notice any danger or illegal activity
vigilant.translation[0].definitions[0].e: Please remain vigilant at all times and report anything suspicious.
vigilant.translation[0].note_box[0].item: In everyday English, people usually use the expression watch out rather than be vigilant:
We were told to watch out for anything suspicious.
